mapper.update: UPDATE resourceGroup SET groupName = #{groupName} WHERE groupNum = #{groupNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resourceList( groupNum, resourceName, color, occupancy) VALUES(#{groupNum},#{resourceName}, #{color}, #{occupancy})
mapper.select: SELECT resourceNum, groupNum, resourceName, color, occupancy FROM resourceList WHERE resourceNum = #{resourceNum}

SELECT resourceNum id, rl.groupNum, groupName, resourceName title, color eventColor, occupancy FROM resourceList rl JOIN resourceGroup rg ON rl.groupNum = rg.groupNum ORDER BY rl.groupNum, resourceNum
SELECT resourceNum, resourceName, occupancy FROM resourceList WHERE groupNum=#{groupNum} ORDER BY resourceNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resourceScheduler( resourceNum, userId, title, startDay, endDay, startTime, endTime, inwon) VALUES( #{resourceNum}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, #{startTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inwon})
mapper.update: UPDATE resourceScheduler SET resourceNum=#{resourceNum}, title=#{title}, startDay=#{startDay}, endDay=#{endDay}, startTime=#{startTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endTime=#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inwon=#{inwon} WHERE num = #{num} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT num, resourceNum, r.userId, userName, title, startDay, endDay, startTime, endTime, inwon, created FROM resourceScheduler r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId=m.userId WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT num id, groupName, rs.resourceNum resourceId, title, CASE WHEN startTime IS NULL THEN startDay ELSE CONCAT(startDay,'T',startTime) END AS "start", CASE WHEN endTime IS NULL THEN endDay ELSE CONCAT(endDay,'T',endTime) END AS "end", startDay, startTime, endDay, endTime, rs.userId,nickname userName, occupancy, resourceName, rl.groupNum, inwon FROM resourceScheduler rs JOIN resourceList rl ON rs.resourceNum = rl.resourceNum JOIN resourceGroup rg ON rl.groupNum = rg.groupNum JOIN memberInfo m ON rs.userId = m.userId WHERE date_format(startDay, '%Y-%m-%d') > #{start} AND date_format(endDay, '%Y-%m-%d') < #{end} ORDER BY groupNum, resourceId, num
